galleryPage.description: View all our work and see for yourself our professional skills!

servicesSection.subtitle: Learn more about our services to take full advantage of our capabilities!

services.title: CAD Modeling
services.description: We model structures of any complexity. Modeling on stumps and structures on implants.

services.title: Milling
services.description: Zirconium (ZrO2), Plastic (PMMA), Wax (WAX), Titanium (Ti), Cobalt chromium (CoCr), individual titanium abutment (Premill).

services.title: Grinding
services.description: Lithium disilicate blocks, Feldspar blocks, Hybrid ceramic (composite) blocks.

services.title: 3D Printing
services.description: Models, Burn-out wax, Temporary, Artificial gums, Base, Caps / templates.

ourEquipment.description: Learn more about our equipment and make sure that we work with high-quality equipment that guarantees excellent results!

chooseSection.subtitle: We provide an individual approach to each client, guaranteeing high quality service and effective solutions. By choosing us, you will get a reliable partner who will help you achieve your goals.

items.description: We use modern CAD/CAM software solutions that allow us to create the most accurate 3D models and perform complex engineering calculations. Thanks to innovative approaches, we provide high-quality design that meets modern energy industry standards.

Our engineers and designers have many years of experience in the energy sector. We are constantly improving our skills to offer the best solutions. Every project we undertake is carried out by a team of professionals who understand the specifics of your industry.

We believe that every client is unique, so we offer personalized solutions that take into account all your needs, goals and constraints. Together with you, we develop the optimal strategy that will allow you to achieve maximum results.

Our milling center is equipped with the most modern equipment that meets leading standards of accuracy. Thanks to the use of innovative technologies and advanced solutions in the field of material processing, we ensure impeccable quality of each product.

Zirconium, plastic, wax, titanium, cobalt-chromium, lithium disilicate are just some of the materials we successfully work with. Our team has extensive experience working with a variety of materials, which allows us to find optimal solutions for each project.

We don't just complete a project and hand it over to the client. Our team stays with you throughout the entire implementation process: from the first sketch to implementation and technical support. You can be sure that you will receive help at any time.

trustedSection.description: We are proud to partner with the best brands and companies that share our values ​​and passion for innovation. Together we create the best solutions for you.

reviews.name: Gaborets Yuriy
reviews.quote: A cool team of professionals who are able to fulfill orders in an incredibly short time. And this is just the first impression. Let's go! Consultations, training, help, trust, care for the client's reputation, etc.

reviews.name: Mykhaylo Hryshchuk
reviews.quote: Mega Dent lab dental laboratory is a partner of Cad Cam Energy. Quality, speed, accuracy, responsibility - words that characterize the milling center + powerful courier service. I recommend!

reviews.name: Lozinskiy Ihor
reviews.quote: I would recommend CadCam Energy to all technicians, I have been working with them for years, I am satisfied with their responsibility, experience, quality and timely completion of the work they performed.

storeSection.title: Our online store - SeTrade
storeSection.description: Every smile is an expression of personality and careful attitude to health. In this regard, high-quality dental materials and dental equipment are important components of the process of their creation. SeTrade online store of dental materials is a look at the new generation of dentistry. In this context, it embodies the concept of accessibility of the most modern means, creating opportunities for professional development and achieving the highest standards in the field of oral health.

ourGallery.description: View all our work and see for yourself our professional skills!

faq.subtitle: Check out the most frequently asked questions from our customers and maybe you can find the answer for yourself!

materials.question: What materials can be used for milling?
materials.answer: We work with zirconium (ZrO2), plastic (PMMA), wax (WAX), titanium (Ti), cobalt-chrome (CoCr), and also create individual titanium abutments (PreMill). We use modern CAD/CAM software solutions that allow us to create the most accurate 3D models and perform complex engineering calculations. Thanks to innovative approaches, we provide high-quality design that meets modern energy industry standards.

services.question: What services does the CADCAM Energy milling center provide?
services.answer: CADCAM Energy milling center offers modeling, milling, grinding, pressing, 3D printing, laser sintering and manufacturing of products from various materials, such as zirconium, titanium, CoCr, plastic, etc. The company ensures high quality and promptness of order fulfillment.

workingHours.question: Do you work 24/7?
workingHours.answer: Our working hours for accepting orders are from 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM, and we mill 24/7.

warranty.question: Is there a warranty on the products?
warranty.answer: We provide a guarantee for all our products in accordance with established quality standards. The duration of the guarantee period depends on the specific product and is indicated in the accompanying documentation. In case of defects, we guarantee free repair or replacement of the product.

orderFulfillment.question: How quickly is the order fulfilled?
orderFulfillment.answer: Order fulfillment depends on the size and complexity of the product and can take from 1 to 3 business days.

interested.text: If you are interested in our milling services and would like to entrust us with your order, contact us to clarify all the details, we are always open for communication.

popularSection.title: Popular products
popularSection.description: The following materials are the most popular among the presented products

products.title: AmeraLabs DMD-21 LED Sand
products.description: A real miracle for creating dental models. Designed and manufactured to the highest standards, it offers impeccable precision and stability. Its unique properties ensure outstanding quality of reproduction, making it one of the most effective materials for creating dental models.

products.title: Slim Pad Pro - Build Up
products.description: Takes a special place among ceramic ones products. It opens up new opportunities for dentists, giving them a wide palette for mixing ceramics that provides not only an impeccable result, but also incredible simplicity in work.

founderSection.name: Serhiy Hrybovskyy
founderSection.title: Founder of the company
founderSection.description: Each technician has an original approach to work that is unique to him or her. This reflects the love for their work in working on customer orders. At all stages of cooperation with the dentist, clients receive full information support of the highest class. We treat many patients throughout their lives. We advise, recommend, consult and help.
